article: Anne is a newspaper reporter. She chose this  _  so she could travel around the world. The work has taught her many unforgettable lessons. She has seen wars, earthquakes and death. But she has  _  seen courage, hope and happiness. Last year, she won an award for her reporting in Africa. She was very proud  _  it. At first, she thought she got the award because of her good work. But then she realized that she should thank many other people for  _  help. Anne was born in Jamaica. Her family was not poor, but it was not  _  , either. Her parents had to  _  hard so that she could go to school. At school, Anne was not a good student,  _  she enjoyed writing because her English teacher said, "Anne, you are a wonderful  _  ." The teacher encouraged her all the time. Later, Anne went to university in Canada and then  _  for a job. It was very difficult. Then, one day, she went to see the editor of a newspaper in Ottawa. The editor gave her a job. "Everyone needs a  _  at first." he said.
